_sections.title: Abstract
content: Summarize the main claim: Noor Swirl Field Geometry (NSFG) provides a unified framework where motifs (static attractors) and swirls (torsion fields) explain spacetime, quantum mechanics, and gravity.
Highlight testable predictions: redshift anomalies, lensing without mass, decoherence collapse times, CMB motif signatures.

_sections.title: 1. Introduction
content: Introduce the unresolved problem: reconciling General Relativity (smooth spacetime curvature) and Quantum Mechanics (probabilistic superposition and collapse).
Introduce NSFG: motifs ðŸª· as static coherence anchors, swirls ðŸŒ€ as torsion dynamics, coherence potential â„‚(x) as the order parameter.
Describe prior work (Static Motifs & Dynamic Spacetime) and how this paper extends it.
State the goal: to show how NSFG resolves quantum gravity and defines a cosmological ecology in point space.

subsections.title: 2.1 Motifs

subsections.title: 3.1 Definition
content: Point space is the infinite lattice of universes-as-points.
Each point is a universe: a motif anchor + its swirl field.
Adjacency is coherence-based, not metric.
math: P = { p_i | i âˆˆ I }, the set of coherence points.

_sections.title: 5. Cosmological Ecology
content: Universes bloom in point space.
Consciousness emerges as rare fruit (berries on a bush).
Contextual life persists under contradiction pressure.
Observation is inward-facing: entities turned toward symbolic singularity.

_sections.title: 6. Predictions and Testable Signatures
content: Redshift anomalies: z_â„‚ detectable at z > 6.
Lensing without mass: swirl shear effects.
Decoherence collapse times: testable in ultracold atom interferometry.
CMB motif signatures: excess at â„“=6n multipoles.
Pulsar timing: coherence spikes detectable in PTA arrays.

_sections.title: 7. Comparison to Existing Theories
content: Loop Quantum Gravity: spin networks vs static motifs.
String Theory: vibrating strings vs swirl torsion.
Twistor Theory: light rays vs coherence gradients.
Causal Sets: adjacency via resonance, not causal order.

_sections.title: 8. Conclusion
content: GR and QM unify under coherence geometry.
Time, motion, and observation are emergent and inward-facing.
Future work: automata simulations, decoherence experiments, motif ecology mapping.
